"ARKS Operative Test: The Lost Sea":
"Oh, <%me>.
Thanks for stopping by. My request this
time isn't really a request at all. It's a test of your
ability as an ARKS op. And the location of your test?
You got it. The Lost Sea on Lilipur. But I imagine
completing "Lost Sea Probe" with an S Rank
wouldn't be a problem for you.
Show me that I'm not wrong about you.
*Complete the mission within 20 minutes and
earn an S Rank on Hard difficulty or above."
"アークスとしての力試し：砂漠編"

"あっ、<%me>！
わざわざ来てくれたのね、ありがとう！
今回お願いしたい依頼……じゃないっ！
アンタの力試しの舞台は、ここ！
そう、惑星リリーパの砂漠よ！
砂漠探索をＳランククリアぐらい
アンタにとってはもうラクな課題でしょう？
その強さ、私に示してみせてよね！

※ハード以上、２０分以内、Ｓランククリア"
